nodes.excerpt: Your own version of The Bachelor(ette). Every week, we'll feature bachelor(ette)s you can pitch a date to. We'll live stream some of the finalists. Even if you're not interested in dating one of our bachelor(ette)s, you can matchmake them for prizes.

localize.tagline: 向我们的单身汉们推荐一个约会。

nodes.excerpt: Think your company is data driven? Probably. But how do you ensure your data is creating real value for your customers? In this eBook, you’ll learn how use your data to: 👩🏼‍💻 Empower your customers 🏆 Improve your product offering 📈 Drive enduring growth
nodes.title: From Data-Driven to Data Everywhere - How to drive growth with user-facing analytics
nodes.author: Charles Miglietti

localize.description: 认为你的公司是数据驱动的？可能吧。但你如何确保你的数据为客户创造真正的价值？在这本电子书中，您将学习如何使用您的数据。赋予你的客户权力 🏆 改善你的产品供应 📈 推动持久的增长。
localize.tagline: 如何通过面向用户的分析来推动增长？

localize.description: 認爲你的公司是數據驅動的？可能吧。但你如何確保你的數據爲客戶創造真正的價值？在這本電子書中，您將學習如何使用您的數據。賦予你的客戶權力 🏆 改善你的產品供應 📈 推動持久的增長。
localize.tagline: 如何通過面向用戶的分析來推動增長？

nodes.excerpt: Lucky Carrot is an All-in-One Employee Engagement Platform: ⠀ ◾ enables the employees to recognize each other, ◾ brings visibility to employees’ achievements, ◾ makes the employees’ voice heard through surveys, ◾ gives insights to enhance employee engagement.
nodes.title: Lucky Carrot - Make your employees super engaged, recognized, & appreciated

nodes.excerpt: Join us for a weekly fireside chat with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta: former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, Previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
nodes.title: UserLeap: The Biggest Launch - Learn what makes or breaks a successful product launch
nodes.author: Ryan Glasgow

nodes.excerpt: Bitwit has the vision of making Bitcoin a commonly accepted currency. We enable Bitcoin holders to see where they can spent their money. Bitwit also helps people understand what their daily purchases cost in Bitcoin using the Bitcoin Daily feature.
nodes.title: Bitwit - Find companies that accept bitcoin as payment
nodes.author: Mehdi

localize.description: Bitwit的愿景是让比特币成为一种普遍接受的货币。我们让比特币的持有者能够看到他们的钱可以花在哪里。Bitwit还通过Bitcoin Daily功能帮助人们了解他们每天购买比特币的成本。
localize.tagline: 寻找接受比特币支付的公司

localize.description: Bitwit的願景是讓比特幣成爲一種普遍接受的貨幣。我們讓比特幣的持有者能夠看到他們的錢可以花在哪裏。Bitwit還通過Bitcoin Daily功能幫助人們瞭解他們每天購買比特幣的成本。
localize.tagline: 尋找接受比特幣支付的公司

nodes.excerpt: Each US state has different schedules and policies for vaccine distribution, so it can be hard to figure out when and where to get vaccinated. We built this simple, free tool so educators can easily monitor their eligibility and subscribe for updates.
nodes.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker for Teachers - A state-by-state educator guide to vaccine eligibility.
nodes.author: Tessa Mu

localize.description: 美国每个州都有不同的疫苗分发时间表和政策，因此很难弄清何时何地接种疫苗。我们建立了这个简单、免费的工具，使教育工作者可以轻松地监测他们的资格和订阅更新。
localize.tagline: 各州教育工作者对疫苗资格的指南。

localize.description: 美國每個州都有不同的疫苗分發時間表和政策，因此很難弄清何時何地接種疫苗。我們建立了這個簡單、免費的工具，使教育工作者可以輕鬆地監測他們的資格和訂閱更新。
localize.tagline: 各州教育工作者對疫苗資格的指南。

nodes.excerpt: Valora is a P2P payment app that allows you to send money like a text message to anyone worldwide. Powered by the Celo blockchain platform, Valora is the only wallet that enables trustless mobile transactions, with an easy-to-use UX, at near-zero fees.
nodes.title: Valora - Send money like a text message to anyone worldwide
nodes.author: Naval Ravikant

localize.description: Valora是一款P2P支付应用，你可以像发短信一样给全球任何人发钱。在Celo区块链平台的支持下，Valora是唯一一个能够实现无信任的移动交易的钱包，具有易于使用的UX，几乎零费用。
localize.tagline: 像短信一样向全球任何人发送资金

localize.description: Valora是一款P2P支付應用，你可以像發短信一樣給全球任何人發錢。在Celo區塊鏈平臺的支持下，Valora是唯一一個能夠實現無信任的移動交易的錢包，具有易於使用的UX，幾乎零費用。
localize.tagline: 像短信一樣向全球任何人發送資金

nodes.excerpt: Browse the best parts of your favorite shows, and enjoy a bite-sized method to discover new ones, via a personalized feed of 60-second highlights generated based on your existing library and interests.

nodes.excerpt: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt is an essential AI-powered tool to produce professional and clean code ✅ Let the AI take care of unit testing in all your JavasScript or Python functions. Thanks to our little pony 🦄 save time, energy and focus on what truly matters in your code 😎

localize.description: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt 是一个必不可少的人工智能驱动的工具，可以生成专业而干净的代码✅ 让人工智能来负责你所有 JavasScript 或 Python 函数的单元测试。多亏了我们的小马驹🦄，节省了时间和精力，并专注于代码中真正重要的东西😎。
localize.tagline: 用于单元测试的AI动力独角兽。

localize.description: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt 是一個必不可少的人工智能驅動的工具，可以生成專業而乾淨的代碼✅ 讓人工智能來負責你所有 JavasScript 或 Python 函數的單元測試。多虧了我們的小馬駒🦄，節省了時間和精力，並專注於代碼中真正重要的東西😎。
localize.tagline: 用於單元測試的AI動力獨角獸。

nodes.excerpt: Anyone can have great ideas, but not everyone is a designer! Powered by AI, Uizard empowers anyone to easily design interactive web & mobile apps. 🛠 rapid prototyping, 🧠 brainstorming and ideation workshops, ✍️ design sprints, 👔 pitching clients, & more.

nodes.excerpt: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.
nodes.title: Partnerbow - Easy way to request, negotiate and approve price estimates.
nodes.author: Taavi Raidma

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以让您简单地请求和协商多个合作伙伴的报价，批准或拒绝建议的工时和定价，跟踪付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴机构和自由职业者的最新目录。
localize.tagline: 简单的方法来申请、谈判和批准价格估算。

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以讓您簡單地請求和協商多個合作伙伴的報價，批准或拒絕建議的工時和定價，跟蹤付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴機構和自由職業者的最新目錄。
localize.tagline: 簡單的方法來申請、談判和批准價格估算。

nodes.excerpt: ABtesting.ai uses Artificial Intelligence to create, combine and test different variations of headlines, copies, calls to action and Images, to find the best fit for your audience, increasing conversions and reducing costs.
nodes.title: ABtesting.ai - Skyrocket your conversion rates on autopilot (using GPT-3)
nodes.author: Franco Gobbo

localize.description: ABtesting.ai使用人工智能来创建、组合和测试不同的标题、副本、行动呼吁和图像的变化，以找到最适合您的受众，提高转换率并降低成本。
localize.tagline: 在自动驾驶仪上大幅提升您的转换率（使用GPT-3）。

localize.description: ABtesting.ai使用人工智能來創建、組合和測試不同的標題、副本、行動呼籲和圖像的變化，以找到最適合您的受衆，提高轉換率並降低成本。
localize.tagline: 在自動駕駛儀上大幅提升您的轉換率（使用GPT-3）。

nodes.excerpt: Grow your community on Clubhouse with Comet Events ⚡️ Create a beautiful landing page & manage RSVPs 💬 Share shownotes, top highlights, and questions on chat 🗓 Subscribe to calendars for smart notifications
nodes.title: Comet Events - Event page & chat for your Clubhouse event
nodes.author: Keshav Rao

localize.description: 在Clubhouse上用Comet Events发展你的社区 ⚡️ 创建一个漂亮的登陆页面和管理RSVP 💬 在聊天中分享展示、最重要的亮点和问题 🗓 订阅日历以获得智能通知。
localize.tagline: 为您的会所活动提供活动页面和聊天室

localize.description: 在Clubhouse上用Comet Events發展你的社區 ⚡️ 創建一個漂亮的登陸頁面和管理RSVP 💬 在聊天中分享展示、最重要的亮點和問題 🗓 訂閱日曆以獲得智能通知。
localize.tagline: 爲您的會所活動提供活動頁面和聊天室
